doc:
Will Rogers Jr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Will_Rogers_Jr. 0 William Vann Rogers, generally known as Will Rogers Jr. (October 20, 1911 – July 9, 1993), was a son of legendary humorist Will Rogers (1879–1935) and his wife, the former Betty Blake (1879–1944). He was a Democratic U. S. Representative from California from January 3, 1943, until May 23, 1944, when he resigned to return to the United States Army. Rogers had several other careers, notably as a newspaper owner/publisher, actor, writer, and political commentator. William_Vann_Rogers , generally_known as Will_Rogers_Jr. ( October_20_,_1911 – July_9_,_1993 ) , was a_son of legendary_humorist Will Rogers ( 1879 – 1935 ) and his_wife , the_former_Betty_Blake ( 1879 – 1944 ) . He was a_Democratic_U._S._Representative from California from January_3_,_1943 , until May_23_,_1944 , when he resigned_to_return to the_United_States_Army . Rogers had several_other_careers , notably as a_newspaper_owner/publisher , actor , writer , and political_commentator .
